title: Lich King Mordekaiser
body:
Mordekiaser, who keeps himself alive and enslaves others' souls by dark necromantic magic, needs a Lich King/Soulstealer/Worldbreaker skin. Not only is it fitting for his lore, but it is the epitome of Morde: an undead warlord using Necromancy to survive; a force that is to be reckoned with.

Once Mordekaiser gets a skin to remind players of his legacy, the Lich will reign ONCE more.

i think they wont give him skins till they rework him
